feels.name: Reluctance
feels.quote: He declined the generous proffer with affected earnestness of refusal.

feels.name: Astonishment
feels.quote: He expressed the utmost astonishment at this generous proffer.

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: He was comforted with the promise that she would remember the rendezvous of next day.

feels.name: Distress
feels.quote: He was wrung with mortal anguish at the prospect of parting for ever from his lovely Wilhelmina.

feels.name: Sorrow
feels.quote: He was instantly seized with an agony of fear and distraction.

feels.name: Melancholy
feels.quote: He was wrung with mortal anguish at the prospect of parting for ever from his lovely Wilhelmina.

feels.name: Hope
feels.quote: He yielded to her fervent request, rather with a view to calm the present transports of her sorrow.

feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: He did not doubt that the mine of his craft would take effect.

Places.name: Wilhelmina_s_chamber
Places.description: Location of the dreadful resolution and fervent request

Places.name: His_own_lodging
Places.description: Location of the expectation of success
